content:
Was looking to replace my budgeting app YNAB (youneedabudget.com), with a :fosstodon: alternative, plus save the $7 a month! In these trying SARS-CoV-2 times, money is a sparse resource... 💸

And I think I found it, Firefly III (github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii). Pretty 🔥. Just spin it up as a Docker container on my server. Plus I would really like my finances encrypted and private, so definitely an added benefit there too! But that being said, YNAB is a solid app and the community is great! 😊
